definition: to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]

sentences.english: Draw the wind and hold the various schools of thinkers' head, there are one's own unique artistic styles.
sentences.chinese: 畫風容百家之長，並有自己獨特的藝術風格。

sentences.english: Nana's enigmatic face is a major feature of Yang Na's painting style.
sentences.chinese: 納納那張不可思議的臉孔，是楊納畫風的一大特色。
吳曉科老師藝術詩畫風。

sentences.english: Van Gogh was undoubtedly influenced by the Impressionism that swept the city's art world.
sentences.chinese: 梵高顯然深受當時襲捲巴黎藝壇的印象派畫風影響。

sentences.english: The second is of a modernistic style.
sentences.chinese: 第二首是現代派的畫風。

sentences.english: There is a high gale in that sky, and on this hill-top.
sentences.chinese: 是誰教你畫風的，天空中和山頂上都颳着大風。

sentences.english: The painting demonstrates Wu Daozi's basic painting style.
sentences.chinese: 從中反映了吳道子的基本畫風。

sentences.english: The Shanghai style differs a lot from the Lingnan style of painting.
sentences.chinese: 海派的畫風與嶺南派有很大不同。

sentences.english: Description: Early design inspired by Kodomo no Omocha.
sentences.chinese: 根據《玩偶遊戲》畫風的初期設計。

sentences.english: With few details, you are emotional and naive, they care little for details and are a risk-taker.
sentences.chinese: 畫風粗略的人，天真且情緒化，不拘小節勇於冒險。

sentences.english: Nowadays, picture wind is changed somewhat, do not change its inherent agrestic complex however.
sentences.chinese: 如今，畫風有所改變，卻不改其固有的鄉土情結。

definition: scene/tableau/picture/image/screen (displayed by a computer)/(motion picture) frame/field of view
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
to suggest (rather than depict in detail)/freehand style of Chinese painting, characterized by bold strokes rather than accurate details
line (in drawing, calligraphy etc)/the lines or contours of a three-dimensional object (hairstyle, clothing, car etc)
